general_advisory: Drain out excess water from the paddy and non-paddy crops. Harvest the matured vegetables & flowers and keep in safe place...

advisory: Due to prevailing wet and humid conditions the attack of pests like Yellow stem borer and leaf folder may increase in the crop...
The present high humid weather condition and rainfall followed by clear sky is favourable for Brown Plant Hopper (BPH) and White Backed Plant Hopper...
To manage the fall army worm pest spray biopesticide Beauveria bassiana @ 1200-gram/acre by mixing in 200 litre of water...
Brinjal is at flowering to fruiting stage. After receding of rainfall and there is chance of increasing in day & night temperature and morning relative humidity...
There are chances of sucking pest like aphids, Jassids, thrips and whiteflies in Okra due to present weather condition...
Rainy and humid weather , high morning RH (>85%) & water saturated soil favoursDowny Mildew disease in cucurbit vegetables...
Monsoon rain might lead to dampness and lack of drainage, use sand and ash to get rid of the excess moisture. Clean the shelter floor twice with phenyl...
After stocking of Fingerling, groundnut oil cake and rice bran at 1:1 ratio as feed given @ 5% of their body weight twice a day...
